subject: Re: [junit] JMS TestCase anyone ?
msgSnippet: There is a contributed library, but I think Vincent wants something more like integration tests. Perhaps closer to HttpUnit. Steve ... From: -- --
messageBody:
There is a contributed library, but I think Vincent wants something more
like integration tests. Perhaps closer to HttpUnit.

Steve
